ygData.subject: RE: Mask of the Deciever
ygData.msgSnippet: IIRC.....  It is found off some critter in SolA.  It is a NO DROP item, so you have to loot the item yourself.
ygData.messageBody:
IIRC..... It is found off some critter in SolA. It is a NO DROP item,
so you have to loot the item yourself.
